## Checklist

- [ ] JSON is valid according to schema (`npm run validate-mcps`)
- [ ] MCP ID is unique and follows naming convention
- [ ] All required fields are filled
- [ ] URLs are valid and accessible
- [ ] No sensitive information (API keys, tokens) included
- [ ] Logo URL is accessible (if provided)

## Testing

- [ ] Tested locally with MCP Inspector
- [ ] `npm run validate-mcps` passes
- [ ] `npm run list-mcps` shows the new/updated MCP
